A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I know how to solve ALL of this mess. I can save everything. 
Since they 'jumped the shark' already\, with Leia. Why don't we go all the way.
Go full on 'Dallas'. It was all a dream. Or in this case\, a vision. 
We open Ep. 9 right where JJ left off in 7. (And I personally did not like 7 either....but I digress) We open with  Rey holding the lightsaber and Luke holding it too. Luke lets go\, and steps away\, overwhelmed. He just saw the image of the future if he didn't train Rey. Episode 8 was how everything will turn out to be a disaster if he does not train her. Done.
